mapper.select:
SELECT MEM_ID CT , INS_DATE C_DATE , CT_SUB_GRP , BRNCH_ID FROM (
-- Added for Air Conditioner project - Display ACT (A.K.A CT) in allocation list -- Hui Ding SELECT M.MEM_CODE, M.MEM_ID, M1.CT_SUB_GRP, M.BRNCH AS BRNCH_ID FROM ORG0001D M JOIN SYS0047M U ON M.MEM_CODE = U.USER_NAME JOIN SYS0045M R ON U.USER_ID = R.USER_ID JOIN SYS0005M B ON B.BRNCH_ID = M.BRNCH LEFT JOIN ORG0005D M1 ON M1.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE R.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(CODE) FROM SYS0094M C WHERE C.IND = 'ACI_ROLE') AND M1.MEM_LVL = 3 -- Admin only assign to ACM. and ACM will distribute to ACI accordingly. AND M.STUS = 1 AND B.CODE = (SELECT F.AC_BRNCH_CODE FROM SAL0001D A , SAL0045D B , SAL0023D E , SYS0064M F WHERE A.SALES_ORD_ID =#{ORD_ID} AND A.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID AND B.ADD_ID = E.CUST_ADD_ID AND E.AREA_ID = F.AREA_ID)
SELECT DISTINCT TT.MEM_CODE, T.MEM_ID, T.CT_SUB_GRP, TT.BRNCH AS BRNCH_ID FROM SVC0054M T, ORG0001D TT WHERE T.MEM_ID = TT.MEM_ID AND TT.STUS = 1 AND CT_SUB_GRP IN (SELECT F.DT_SUB_GRP FROM SAL0001D A , SAL0045D B , SAL0023D E , SYS0064M F WHERE A.SALES_ORD_ID = #{ORD_ID} AND A.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID AND B.ADD_ID = E.CUST_ADD_ID AND E.AREA_ID = F.AREA_ID UNION SELECT F.LT_SUB_GRP FROM SAL0001D A , SAL0045D B , SAL0023D E , SYS0064M F WHERE A.SALES_ORD_ID = #{ORD_ID} AND A.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID AND B.ADD_ID = E.CUST_ADD_ID AND E.AREA_ID = F.AREA_ID ) UNION SELECT B.MEM_CODE, B.MEM_ID, C.CT_SUB_GRP, C.BRNCH_ID FROM SYS0005M A , ORG0001D B , ORG0005D C , SYS0064M M WHERE A.BRNCH_ID = B.BRNCH AND B.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID AND C.MEM_LVL = '2' AND B.STUS = '1' AND A.CODE = (SELECT F.DT_BRNCH_CODE FROM SAL0001D A , SAL0045D B , SAL0023D E , SYS0064M F WHERE A.SALES_ORD_ID = #{ORD_ID} AND A.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID AND B.ADD_ID = E.CUST_ADD_ID AND E.AREA_ID = F.AREA_ID)
) C, (SELECT TO_CHAR ( (TO_DATE(#{S_DATE}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - 1) + LEVEL, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INS_DATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (SELECT CODE FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = #{termDtCd})) TB ORDER BY C.MEM_CODE, INS_DATE ASC

/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.services.install.impl.HcOrderCallListMapper.searchHcOrderCallList */ SELECT Extent1.CALL_ENTRY_ID , Extent1.CALL_TYPE_ID , Extent1.CALL_TYPE_CODE , Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID , Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO , Extent1.APP_TYPE_ID , Extent1.APP_TYPE_NAME , Extent1.CALL_STUS_ID , Extent1.CALL_STUS_CODE , Extent1.PRODUCT_CODE , Extent1.PRODUCT_NAME , Extent1.CUST_NAME , Extent1.CUST_IC , Extent1.INSTALL_AREA_ID , Extent1.INSTALL_AREA_NAME , Extent1.STATE , Extent1.AREA , Extent1.DSC_BRNCH_ID , Extent1.PO_NO , Extent1.INSTALL_TEL_M , Extent1.INSTALL_TEL_O , Extent1.INSTALL_TEL_R , Extent1.INSTALL_TEL_F , Extent1.DOC_ID , Extent1.IS_WAIT_CANCL , Extent1.CRT_USER_ID_ID , Extent1.CRT_USER_ID , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( Extent1.CRT_DT || Extent1.CRT_TM ,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , Extent1.CALL_TYPE_NAME , Extent1.RCD_TMS , Extent1.POSTCODE , Extent1.DSC_CODE , Extent1.DSC_CODE_2 , Extent1.CALL_LOG_DT , Extent1.ECOMM_ORD_ID , Extent1.PROMO_ID , Extent1.CALL_FDBCK_CODE || ' - ' || Extent1.CALL_FDBCK_DESC FEED_BACK , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.APP_TYPE_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.APP_TYPE_ID ELSE 0 END C1 , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.CUST_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.CUST_ID ELSE 0 END C2 , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.SALES_ORD_DT IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.SALES_ORD_DT ELSE TO_DATE('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') END C3 , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.PRODUCT_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.PRODUCT_ID ELSE 0 END C4 , Extent1.BNDL_NO , Extent1.VRIFY_FLG , Extent1.ord_STUS_CODE_ID , Extent1.CALL_LOG_ENTRY_DATE , Extent1.WA_STUS_CODE_ID , Extent1.WA_STUS_CODE , Extent1.WA_STUS_DESC , Extent1.WA_REMARKS FROM ( SELECT vCallLogOrderCall.CALL_ENTRY_ID CALL_ENTRY_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.CALLTYPEID CALL_TYPE_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.CALL_TYPE_CODE CALL_TYPE_CODE , vCallLogOrderCall.SALES_ORD_ID SALES_ORD_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.SALES_ORD_NO SALES_ORD_NO , vCallLogOrderCall.APP_TYPE_ID APP_TYPE_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.APPTYPENAME APP_TYPE_NAME , vCallLogOrderCall.SALES_ORD_DT SALES_ORD_DT , vCallLogOrderCall.CALL_STUS_ID CALL_STUS_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.CALL_STUS_CODE CALL_STUS_CODE , vCallLogOrderCall.PRODUCT_ID PRODUCT_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.PRODUCT_CODE || ' - ' || vCallLogOrderCall.PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT_CODE , vCallLogOrderCall.PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT_NAME , vCallLogOrderCall.CUST_ID CUST_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.CUST_NAME CUST_NAME , vCallLogOrderCall.CUST_IC CUST_IC , vCallLogOrderCall.INSTALL_AREA_ID INSTALL_AREA_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.INSTALL_AREA_NAME INSTALL_AREA_NAME , vCallLogOrderCall.CALL_LOG_DT CALL_LOG_DT , vCallLogOrderCall.DSC_BRNCH_ID DSC_BRNCH_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.DSC_BRNCH_ID2 DSC_BRNCH_ID2 , vCallLogOrderCall.PO_NO PO_NO , vCallLogOrderCall.INSTALL_TEL_M INSTALL_TEL_M , vCallLogOrderCall.INSTALL_TEL_O INSTALL_TEL_O , vCallLogOrderCall.INSTALL_TEL_R INSTALL_TEL_R , vCallLogOrderCall.INSTALL_TEL_F INSTALL_TEL_F , vCallLogOrderCall.DOC_ID DOC_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.IS_WAIT_CANCL IS_WAIT_CANCL , vCallLogOrderCall.CRT_USER_ID CRT_USER_ID_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.CRT_USER_ID CRT_USER_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.CRT_DT CRT_DT , vCallLogOrderCall.CRT_TM CRT_TM , vCallLogOrderCall.CALL_TYPE_NAME CALL_TYPE_NAME , vCallLogOrderCall.CALL_FDBCK_ID CALL_FDBCK_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.CALL_FDBCK_CODE CALL_FDBCK_CODE , vCallLogOrderCall.CALL_FDBCK_DESC CALL_FDBCK_DESC , vCallLogOrderCall.RCD_TMS RCD_TMS , vCallLogOrderCall.UPD_DT UPD_DT , vCallLogOrderCall.PROMO_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.VRIFY_FLG VRIFY_FLG , vCallLogOrderCall.STATE , vCallLogOrderCall.AREA , vCallLogOrderCall.POSTCODE , vCallLogOrderCall.DSC_CODE , vCallLogOrderCall.DSC_CODE2 DSC_CODE_2 , vCallLogOrderCall.BNDL_NO , vCallLogOrderCall.ECOMM_ORD_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.SO_CUR_STUS_ID ord_STUS_CODE_ID , TO_CHAR(callog.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') call_log_entry_date , vCallLogOrderCall.WA_STUS_CODE_ID , vCallLogOrderCall.WA_STUS_CODE , vCallLogOrderCall.WA_STUS_DESC , vCallLogOrderCall.WA_REMARKS FROM CCR1002V vCallLogOrderCall
JOIN CCR0006D callog ON callog.call_entry_id = (SELECT MIN(CALL_ENTRY_ID) FROM CCR0006D WHERE CCR0006D.SALES_ORD_ID = vcalllogordercall.SALES_ORD_ID GROUP BY CCR0006D.SALES_ORD_ID) WHERE 1 =1 AND vCallLogOrderCall.BNDL_NO is not null
AND vCallLogOrderCall.DSC_TYPE_ID IN
#{item}
) Extent1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND (Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO = #{orderNo} )
AND Extent1.PRODUCT_ID IN
#{item}
AND Extent1.PROMO_ID IN
#{item}
AND (Extent1.CUST_ID = #{custId} )
AND (Extent1.CUST_NAME = #{custName} )
AND (Extent1.CUST_IC = #{nricNo} )
AND ((Extent1.INSTALL_TEL_F LIKE '%' || #{contactNo} ||'%') OR (Extent1.INSTALL_TEL_M LIKE '%' || #{contactNo} || '%') OR (Extent1.INSTALL_TEL_O LIKE '%' || #{contactNo} || '%') OR (Extent1.INSTALL_TEL_R LIKE '%' || #{contactNo} || '%'))
AND (Extent1.PO_NO = #{PONum} )
AND Extent1.CALL_TYPE_ID IN
#{item}
AND Extent1.APP_TYPE_ID IN
#{item}
AND Extent1.CALL_STUS_ID IN
#{item}
AND Extent1.DSC_BRNCH_ID IN
#{item}
AND Extent1.DSC_BRNCH_ID2 IN
#{item}
AND Extent1.SALES_ORD_DT >= TO_DATE(#{createDate} || ' 00:00:00', 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS')
AND Extent1.SALES_ORD_DT <= TO_DATE(#{endDate} || ' 23:59:59', 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS')
AND Extent1.CALL_LOG_DT >= TO_DATE(#{callStrDate} || ' 00:00:00', 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS')
AND Extent1.CALL_LOG_DT <= TO_DATE(#{callEndDate} || ' 23:59:59', 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS')
AND TRIM(UPPER(Extent1.STATE)) = TRIM(UPPER(#{ordStatus}))
AND TRIM(UPPER(Extent1.area)) = TRIM(UPPER(#{ordArea}))
AND UPPER(Extent1.BNDL_NO) = UPPER(#{bndlNo})
AND Extent1.CALL_FDBCK_ID IN
#{item}
AND Extent1.ECOMM_ORD_ID > 0
ORDER BY Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO ASC
ORDER BY Extent1.CUST_NAME
ORDER BY Extent1.CALL_LOG_DT ASC
ORDER BY Extent1.UPD_DT ASC

SELECT PROMO_ID CODE_ID , C1 , CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT PROMO_ID , PROMO_CODE || ' - ' || PROMO_DESC CODE_NAME , PROMO_DESC C1 FROM SAL0017D WHERE PROMO_STUS_ID = 1 AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN PROMO_DT_FROM AND PROMO_DT_END AND PROMO_TYPE_ID = 2282 ) ORDER BY C1 ASC
